heading: Understand pattern identification
text: MSX Methodology revolves around understanding pattern identification. It involves analyzing data to identify and extract significant patterns.

heading: Pattern mapping user stories
text: Pattern mapping user stories is the second step in MSX Methodology. It involves categorizing user stories according to recognized patterns.

heading: Wireframe and front end
text: After pattern mapping, Our dedicated team creates wireframes and front-end designs. They align with the identified patterns and user stories.

heading: Model development and training
text: Model development and training involves the development of machine learning models and training using the identified patterns and data.

heading: Development and deployment
text: Development and deployment is the final step in MSX Methodology. The developed models are integrated into the software and deployed for use.
